meanings.sent1: The mispronounced word confused the students.
meanings.sent2: She felt embarrassed when she realized she had mispronounced the name.
meanings.sent3: The mispronounced announcement caused a lot of laughter.
meanings.sent4: His mispronounced attempt at singing made everyone cringe.
meanings.sent5: The mispronounced word echoed in her mind, reminding her of the mistake.

meanings.sent1: The mispronounced language made it hard to understand.
meanings.sent2: He mispronounced the foreign word, making it sound strange.
meanings.sent3: The mispronounced joke led to confusion instead of laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her mispronounced speech turned a serious topic into a comedy.
meanings.sent5: The mispronounced phrase lingered in the air, creating a sense of awkwardness.
